name: 2016 International Conference on Materials Science and Nanotechnology
content: All submissions will be peer reviewed by 2-3 reviewers. All the registered and presented papers will be published in volume of Materials Science Forum (ISSN: 1662-9752), Indexed by Elsevier: SCOPUS www.scopus.com. Index Copernicus Journals Master List www.indexcopernicus.com. Google Scholar scholar.google.com. Ei Compendex (CPX) www.ei.org/. Cambridge Scientific Abstracts (CSA) www.csa.com. Inspec (IET, Institution of Engineering Technology) www.theiet.org. SCImago Journal & Country Rank (SJR) www.scimagojr.com. EBSCO www.ebsco.com. All volumes are submitted to Thomson Reuters (WoS) and selected ones will be indexed. (Quoted from http://www.scientific.net/MSF/details)
